summary: Lenovo is a Chinese technology company that makes and sells computers, phones, and other electronics. They are the biggest seller of personal computers worldwide. The company started in Hong Kong and now works in many countries. Lenovo is known for its ThinkPad laptops, which were originally made by IBM. They also make computers for gamers and have research centers in several cities, including Beijing, Shanghai, and Morrisville, USA.
title: Lenovo
